original_text: Then they journeyed from Bethel. When they were still some distance from Ephrath, Rachel went into labor, and she had hard labor.
korean_text: 그들이 벧엘에서 길을 떠나 에브랏에 이르기까지 얼마간 거리를 둔 곳에서 라헬이 해산하게 되어 심히 고생하여

sentences.original_text: When they were still some distance from Ephrath,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 에브랏에서 아직 거리가 있었을 때,
